snippet.title: Rise of the Village Hero - Trailer Updated | Ludus Pax Studios
snippet.description:
#solodev #gamedevelopment #indiedev #gamdev #rpg 

Hello everyone!

I am a solo game developer Studio based in Scotland. I have completed my degree in Computer Games Development.
My game Rise of the Village Hero a small indie RPG inspired from classics  is available to wishlist/purchase
On Steam: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2737960/Rise_of_the_Village_Hero/
On Itchio:
https://ludus-pax-studio.itch.io/rise-of-the-village-hero

The demo has been turned off for now sorry. I felt it was best to just focus on getting the game updated as often as possible and getting it out of early access.

Thank you for watching my videos and for supporting my channels! 
In this video I have updated my trailer and have made much more interesting hopefully and also to showcase more of what is available currently in the early access state.
Thank you for watching.
See you at the next one thank you for watching! 
Dont forget to subscribe, like, comment appreciate your support.
